body_html: Main motivation was to learn PyTorch by coding every necessary stuff. I first checked torchtext but did not want to bring it in as a dependency which brings along nltk and spacy. It also seemed to have many new layers of abstractions like Samples, Fields. Moreover, with images and texts I thought that at some point I would certainly need to code something ad-hoc which may not be covered by any provided facility. But thanks, I'm still checking it from time to time and maybe at some point I'll consider switching to it :)

body: Main motivation was to learn PyTorch by coding every necessary stuff. I first checked `torchtext` but did not want to bring it in as a dependency which brings along nltk and spacy. It also seemed to have many new layers of abstractions like Samples, Fields. Moreover, with images and texts I thought that at some point I would certainly need to code something ad-hoc which may not be covered by any provided facility. But thanks, I'm still checking it from time to time and maybe at some point I'll consider switching to it :)
